name: Oni's Dungeon
description:
Welcome to Oni's dungeon.

Oni’s Dungeon is a hack and slash dungeon crawler in a medieval dark fantasy setting.

You play as a nameless oni who has fallen inside an the Delunium dungeon awakening the long forgotten horrors within. With only a few spell and sheer determination you’ll have to fight your way through the levels of the Delunium to reach the surface.

This is only a demo but don’t let that deter you from taking up arms against the dungeons inhabitants.
